description:
There’s been one certain thing proven about the film industry – nothing is certain. A major movie from two of the biggest directors in Hollywood was recently released. It was based on an extremely popular illustrated novel. With this formula for success, the film managed to become the worst reviewed movie of 2025, and yet [...]

title: Worst Reviewed Movie Of 2025 Takes Top Spot On Netflix

description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has once again been flourishing with numerous films, television shows, and other projects being released on a frequent basis. However, some projects have been more difficult to get off the ground than others. In fact, a new report claims that Marvel Studios made the decision to cancel an upcoming MCU movie. [...]

The post Marvel Studios Reportedly Cancels Upcoming MCU Movie appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Studios Reportedly Cancels Upcoming MCU Movie
